scripts.html:dev: npm run html:build && chokidar "src/pages/**/*.html" -c "npm run html:build"
scripts.css:dev: concurrently "postcss src/css/style.css -o public/css/style.css -w" "postcss src/css/style.css -o public/css/style.min.css --env production -w"
scripts.js:dev: npm run js:build && chokidar "src/js/**/*.js" -c "npm run js:build"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n CSS,JS,HTML "npm run css:dev" "npm run js:dev" "npm run html:dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n WATCH,NETLIFY "npm run dev:watch" "npx netlify dev"
scripts.css:build: postcss src/css/style.css -o public/css/style.css && postcss src/css/style.css -o public/css/style.min.css --env production
scripts.js:build: npx terser src/js/script.js -c -m -o public/js/script.min.js && npx terser src/js/form.js -c -m -o public/js/form.min.js
scripts.build: npm run css:build && npm run js:build && npm run html:build
